text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Prime Minister Abdellatif Filali holds talks with Italian Prime Minister Romano Prodi.
- Political parties and the government sign an election agreement.
- A criminal court jails five students to one year for insulting state servants in the eastern region of Oujda.
- Political parties and the government agree on a "charter of honour".
- Egypt's parliament speaker Mohamed Jalal Essaid to visit Morocco on Sunday.
